Assessment.QuestionText: You want to create an <font face="courier new">OpenFileDialog</font> dialog box within the application, which will allow you to open .txt and .rtf files. Which one of the following codes will help you to achieve this?

Options.Option:
OpenFileDialog odlgFile = new OpenFileDialog();
odlgFile.Filter = "Text files (*.txt)|*.txt|Rich Text Format files(*.rtf)|*.rtf";
odlgFile.ShowDialog();

OpenFileDialog odlgFile = new OpenFileDialog();
odlgFile.AutoFilter = "Text files (*.txt)|*.txt|Rich Text Format files(*.rtf)|*.rtf";
odlgFile.ShowDialog();

OpenFileDialog odlgFile = new OpenFileDialog();
odlgFile.Filters = "Text files (*.txt)*.txt|Rich Text Format files(*.rtf)|*.rtf";
odlgFile.ShowDialog();

OpenFileDialog odlgFile = new OpenFileDialog();
odlgFile.FilterSelect = "Text files (*.txt)|*.txt|Rich Text Format files(*.rtf)|*.rtf";
odlgFile.ShowDialog();

Assessment.CorrectFeedback: Yes, that's correct! You get one point for your response.
Assessment.incorrectFeedback: No, that's incorrect. The correct selection is: (A).
